html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_METHOD_DISCLAIME:
• Next Day shipping is available till 11 PM ET for orders placed Mon—Fri (excluding holidays). Subject to inventory availability for destinations within the contiguous U.S. only.
  • 2 – Day orders placed by 8 PM ET Mon—Fri and by 2 PM ET on Sat (excluding holidays) arrive in 2 business days. All others arrive in 3 business days.
  • For Saturday by 12 PM delivery, orders must be placed by 4 PM ET on Friday (excluding holidays).
  • All orders subject to final destination and inventory availability.
html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_FREE_SHIPPING_DESCRIPTION:
Free 3-5 Day Shipping

Available for all accessory purchases placed on VerizonWireless.com for delivery within the U.S. only, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. Orders will arrive in 3–5 business days, excluding holidays. All orders under $49 must be placed by 4:00 PM local time.

Free 2-Day Shipping for Orders of $49 or More

Orders placed by 8:00 PM EST Monday–Friday (excluding holidays) will deliver in two (2) business days. Orders placed after 8:00 PM EST on Friday and before 8:00 PM EST on Monday will be delivered on Wednesday. Available for accessory purchases of $49 or more placed on VerizonWireless.com for delivery within the U.S. only, excluding Alaska and Hawaii.

Get Next-Day Shipping until 11:00 PM EST for Orders of $49 or More

Orders placed by 11:00 PM EST Monday–Friday (excluding holidays) will deliver in one (1) business day if the Next-Business-Day shipping option is selected. Orders will be delivered by 10:30 AM or 8:00 PM local time, depending on method chosen.

All orders subject to credit authorization, verification and inventory availability. You will be able to select the shipping option during checkout. Based on the shipping method, signature may be required for delivery. Information will be available during checkout, order confirmation, and confirmation email.

label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUCCESS_MAIN_TITLE: Just confirm the details and you're good to go.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_CHECK_MAIN_TITLE: Check the highlighted areas below to make sure they are complete and/or correct.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_BILLING_ADDRESS_S: To place an order with a new Billing Address, go to My Verizon -> My Profile -> Manage Billing Address. Update it, then log out, log back in and place the order.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_CARD_CVV_TOOLTIP: For your security and protection, we need the card verification number. It's the 3-digit number printed on the back of your Visa, MasterCard or Discover card. For American Express holders, it is the 4-digit number on the front of the card.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_NEXT_DAY_SHIPPING: Want It Tomorrow? Order By 11 PM ET With Next Day Shipping
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_NEXT_DAY_SHIPPING_: Depending on inventory availability for destinations within the US (excluding AK, HI) for orders placed M-F (excluding holidays). Next Day Shipping is not available for devices in pre-order status. Pre-order devices will ship as inventory becomes available.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_FREE_SHIPPING_TOOL: Free 2-day shipping when you order online M-F by 8PM EST, Sat by 2PM EST (excluding holidays), will deliver in two business days within the U.S. only (excluding AK & HI). 2-day orders placed after 2PM EST on Sat will deliver by Wednesday. Overnight shipping to destinations within the U.S. (excluding AK & HI) is generally available for orders placed M-F until 11PM EST, excluding holidays. Orders that contain a pre-order or backorder will ship via 2-day shipping on or prior to the committed date. Subject to credit authorization, verification and inventory availability.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_RETURN_POLICY_TOOL: You may return or exchange wireless devices and accessories purchased from Verizon Wireless within 14 days of purchase. A restocking fee of $35 applies to any return or exchange of a wireless device (excluding Hawaii).
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_TAX_TOOLTIP: Tax is based on the retail price of your product(s)
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BILLING_ADDRESS_SAME_AS_S: My billing address is the same as my shipping address
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BILLING_ADDRESS_DIFFERENT: I have a different billing address from my shipping address
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TAX_DISCLAIMER: The market you're in determines taxes, surcharge and fees, such as E911 and gross receipt charges. As of December 1, 2015, they can add between 7% and 45% to your standard monthly access and other charges. Monthly Federal Universal Service (17.9% of the interstate and international telecom charges, as of April 1, 2016; varies quarterly based on FCC rate), Regulatory (18 cents per voice line, 2 cents per data only line) and Administrative ($1.23 per voice line, 6 cents per data only line) charges are Verizon Wireless charges, not taxes, and are subject to change. For more details on these charges, call 1-888-684-1888.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_RETURN_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: You may return or exchange accessories purchased from Verizon Wireless within 14 days of purchase. If you return your merchandise, even by mistake, after the return period, you will not receive a refund and the merchandise you returned will not be returned to you.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_RETURN_POLICY_EXCHANGE_DE: You are permitted to make one exchange. To make an exchange, return the merchandise (including device, charger, battery, instructions, and any other components) in the ORIGINAL box. All merchandise must be in like–new condition and accompanied by the original receipt. Shipping charges may apply to exchange merchandise sent to you by Verizon Wireless. At our discretion, we may decline your return or charge you a fee for a missing item, or for items that we determine are damaged or require service. If you return and we accept your merchandise within the return period, we will refund your purchase price. If Verizon Wireless must remove installed equipment from a vehicle or fixed location in order to return or exchange it, you will be charged a service fee. Opened software purchased separately may be exchanged only for the exact same item at a Verizon Wireless Communications Store and may not be returned for refund. Before returning or exchanging any accessory that has data in its memory, please transfer all data you wish to retain to another file source. Once the wireless device or accessory is returned, your data cannot be recovered. Additionally, you should retain or destroy any removable or portable memory cards or modules (such as a SIM Card or SD Card) in order to help protect sensitive information, such as mobile banking information.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_FREE_SHIPPING_TITLE: Free Shipping Available on Every Order
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_REVIEW_ORDER_EASY_RETURN_: You may return or exchange wireless devices and accessories purchased from Verizon Wireless within 14 days of purchase. A restocking fee of $35 applies to any return or exchange of a wireless device (excluding Hawaii).
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_REVIEW_ORDER_FREE_SHIPPIN: Free 2-Day Shipping Available on Every Order
Get free 3-5 day shipping on all accessory orders. Spend more than $49 and upgrade to free 2-Day shipping.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_REVIEW_ORDER_POBO_DISCLAI: **** Pre-Orders/Back Orders will ship when ALL items on the order are available. We reserve the right to limit quantities.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_REVIEW_ORDER_TAX_DISCLAIM: * Total does not include taxes, which will be added upon confirmation of your shipping address. In California, sales tax is calculated on the full retail price of the device, not any discounted price you may actually pay. In Massachusetts and Nevada, sales tax is calculated on the VZW cost of the device. Also during the credit check process, a deposit may be added to the total amount due. Pre-orders will be charges to your credit card when the items are actually shipped.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_REVIEW_ORDER_AVAILABILITY: Verizon Wireless makes every reasonable effort to ensure product availability and the accuracy of the information found on our web site. Unfortunately, on occasion, the product you ordered may be out of stock or typographical errors, inaccuracies or omissions may occur. In the event that a product is not available or the listed price is incorrect due to a typographical error, inaccuracy or omission, Verizon Wireless may cancel the order you placed, even if you received an order confirmation and your credit card has been charged. If your card has been charged and we cancel your order , Verizon Wireless will refund the entire charged amount to the card you used. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you.
